description:
cmd/api: follow constant references

For gccgo. Also removes bunch of special cases.

Fixes issue 2906

messages.text:
LGTM

http://codereview.appspot.com/5644050/diff/4001/src/cmd/api/goapi.go
File src/cmd/api/goapi.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5644050/diff/4001/src/cmd/api/goapi.go#newcode466
src/cmd/api/goapi.go:466: // rather than this mess.
Maybe mention that the mess is there to work with Go's standard library but can give wrong results with arbitrary packages?

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

Submitting.

Robert, you may want to take a look too, and I can clean up anything you find in a follow-up CL.

http://codereview.appspot.com/5644050/diff/4001/src/cmd/api/goapi.go

> Maybe mention that the mess is there to work with Go's standard library but can
> give wrong results with arbitrary packages?

Added general BUG note at the top.
